summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 GMC SIERRA 1500. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V383000 (AIR BAGS); HOWEVER, THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. LEN STOLER CHEVROLET OF WEST MINISTER, MARYLAND WAS CONTACTED ABOUT THE RECALL AND STATED THAT THE CONTACT WOULD HAVE TO PAY TO HAVE THE AIR BAG INDICATOR ASSESSED. IN ADDITION, THE DEALER STATED THAT THERE WAS NO REMEDY AVAILABLE FOR THE RECALL. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND PROVIDED CASE NUMBER: 8-245-208-9108. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE "SERVICE AIR BAG" WARNING AND PASSENGER AIR BAG INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
